The Domiflex premium nursing bed comes with continuous side safety rails which provides full safety from head to toe. Different locking positions allow flexibility for seamless safety.

Lockable Handset
The Domiflex premium nursing bed comes with an intelligent handset with a clear menu structure and ergonomic design. It has fewer buttons and large symbols which facilitate intuitive operation.
The handset can also be locked from the back using the key provided, further improving the security of the bed.

Durable Laying Surface
The laying surface of the Domiflex premium nursing bed is made of aluminium, which not only provides an ergonomic sleeping experience but also durability. It is also easily removable for cleaning.

Push-and-Ready
Assemble in less than 5 minutes without any tools, all components are pre-installed.
It is also foldable, allowing for a space-saving storage.
